Submit a design!

If you have an open source design to contribute to the makerspace, please submit it here!

Design Name Category Description Certified Certification will be qualified as having the design certified by the NIH, CDC, ECDC, or an equivalent organization. In progress will indicate the design is in process of approval but has not yet reached it.
